type: Tutorial Step - You Are In Command

definition.text: The search box, my friend, has a double life. Sometimes she searches, but other times she commands, and does stuff... whatever you tell her!

paragraphs.text: Not just anything, of course. There's a list of available commands that have to do with two main subjects:
Let's work on a practical example that involves the two! I'll teach you how to edit the docs, and how to contribute, using a couple of commands!
I'll set up the next few steps with a little story... I hope you like the idea!
